price: 11. Dheh: Waxaa la i amray inaan caabudo Allaah Keliya anigoo u daacad ah aan waxba la wadaajineyn cibaadada.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul innī umir'tu an aʿbuda al-laha mukh'liṣan lahu al-dīna
